statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 12 \\ -8 \\ -18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 0 \\ 22 \\ -14 \\ -33 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
